overview: We are born freely to shape our lives in the manner we want too, without the thought of harming that of an other. The way of nature is free and in that way does it create life. So is it with man as well.  Free will is the expression of the soul. The same will that will not be contained even when it is being claimed.  In “Forced” we see the fight of the upholding of a will that is not one’s own. The question arises for why do we so hardly desire to do that which is in conflict of who we are. That same desire which causes the loss of life.
title: Forced
